3. We must go beyond data exchange and multi-cloud considerations. Europe needs a holistic solution for an easy-to-use, integrated single platform to store data, host algorithms, and perform processing.

2. Data is the new production factor for our economy. We need an independent, technical #infrastructure and ecosystem that will enable us to create, share and use both data and algorithms as well as storage and compute resources in an open and inclusive way.

1. EU needs to make massive investments in #education and #research to develop #NextGen #ML methods and #BigData systems. Basic training in data literacy and computer science competencies need to be taught throughout our educational studies starting at elementary education.
